title: New: Ecstasy – Exhale
body:
Giving M83 a run for their ‘epic-synth-poppers’ title, London’s **Ecstasy** are all set to take 2013 by STORM.

So it’s chart ready, synth-pop by numbers, but when was the last time you heard a band do it this well? Perfecting the art of the four minute pop song, it’s euphoric, uplifting and determinedly rousing. Open your windows, turn off that goddamn TV and _Exhale_; this is the sound of **Ecstasy**.
